    The media currently influencing me

Zach Erdmann

Biography

Zach is a Chicago-based person with serious aversion to the word Creative to describe people who perform multidisciplinary design work. He has an education in experimental film production and is self taught in web design, interaction/usability design and game design. He has also been writing since sometime in elementary school, although most of his early work is garbage.

Qualifications

  • Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, and Wordpress CMS
  • Proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, and Final Cut
  • Comfortable with PHP, Ruby on Rails, C/C++
  • National finalist in both Editorial Writing and General Excellence from Society of Professional Journalists

Relevant Experience

Apple

  • Consistently provided world-class customer service to an unmatched customer base
  • Certified to troubleshoot and repair both Mac and iOS devices
  • Recognized for leadership ability in high-stress situations

Penzeys Spices

  • Worked on a team of creative professionals to highlight customer stories for catalog
  • Flexed between web design, graphic design and photo editing as needed
  • Responsible for peer proofing of written stories and layouts for publication

Education

University of Wisconsin – Milwaukee

  • BFA – Film & Video Production

Obsessions

  • solarpunk
  • left bank cinema
  • urbit
  • art brut
  • Armchair Boogie
  • Jean de Brebeuf
  • jouissance
  • Suzuki Samurai
  • trappist monks
  • cross and circle games
